title: Do even EEE students have math in 2nd yr?

comments.body: As far as I remember, all branches have Linear Algebra in sem 4. If you're in CS/AIML you will have either SDS/MCSE/some variation of it in sem 3 while others have M3.
eee is impossible without math , atleast half of the subjects in 2nd have math in their courses
Yahh EEE students have Math even after 2nd year! But in different namesðŸ’€
I did EEE. Yes, we do have EM3 in 3rd sem and LA in fourth.
